articles.title: The Crown's Emma Corrin looks underwhelmed as she steps out after her Golden Globes win - Daily Mail
articles.description: In stark contrast to her glamorous award-ceremony attire, the Crown star, 25, cut casual figure for her outing, keeping her hood up and her head down
articles.content:
She won Best Actress in a Drama Series at the Golden Globes on Sunday evening.
Yet, Emma Corrin, 25, looked underwhelmed the following day as she donned a hoodie and pair of shades to pick up a coff… [+6787 chars]
